name: The Triad Trials
description:
You play as Ellen, an academic who had a car breakdown in the middle of... somewhere. She goes to look for help, but encounters an odd, old lady who offers to help if Ellen finds her lost earrings. She agrees, but has to enter a strange castle to search for those lost earrings. Inside, there are puzzles and a lot of platforming that put Ellen to the test.

Controls:

Use A & D to move, and the Spacebar to jump. Use E to interact with elements, advance dialogue and Q to take or place cogwheels. Use ESC to open up the pause menu when playing.

Versions:

  • 1.0.0b - Beta first release
  • 1.0.1b - Fixes mayor bugs (like infinite lives) and other design issues (too rough camera movement, not explaining the use of the E button in dialogues, platforming became too hard on some places, etc).

Made with Unity, and the Gamekit2D asset. All pixel art is made by me.
